message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to meet your specific needs and comes with exceptional features that I believe will greatly benefit you. I am confident it will be a valuable asset in your endeavors. Given its quality and capabilities, I am offering it to you for $15000. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm a bit hesitant to pay the full $15000. I'm willing to consider purchasing the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe it's a fair price considering the features and quality you mentioned.
